I had a reservation and no one greeted is at the door. That might‚Äôve been the only issue. It was my first time there. My waitress ROSA was wonderful. She def was helpful ! Will
Be back for a second try.
Lucia was amazing! She was so attentive and kind! ‚ù§Ô∏è
Food was great, atmosphere was good. We really enjoyed ourselves and our server Lucia was amazing and personalable . Great experience!!!!
Lucia nos atendi√≥ de maravilla, nos hizo sentir en casa‚Ä¶. Quiero volver a comer all√≠ las veces que venga a New York de visita. Fue una experiencia deliciosa
Lucia was amazing the food was great.

At sugar i had the pleasure to meet Lucia, my server, she was amazing she was very sweet and always made sure everything was  great also such a fun person. Food was delicious the price was definitely worth it and not expensive what so ever. Drinks where the best part of my lunch.
Lucia was amazing!! Delicious food and great service
The food was amazing! Rosa is wonderful!!!!
Great service, Rosa was amazing. Food and drinks were delicious!

I got the pork belly with rice and beans as a lunch special.

Everything was delicious. The pork belly is crisp. The rice is perfectly cooked. But the beans may be the actual, most savory, umami beans I've ever eaten. Out of this world. I even asked for the recipe.

Had an amazing experience! The server Rosa was the best!!!! The food was so good! I had the chicken wings and the chicken fajita and Rosa added some cheese on top and it was everything!! The steak was seasoned to the Gods!! The drinks were amazing!!! Def got drunk! I will def be back! If you come, def ask for Rosa because she is awesome!! She made sure that the drinks were flowing at the table and I had what I needed! Five stars!!!
Ms.ROSA GAVE US GOOD SERVICE CHECK UP ON US

Lucia gave us; a party of four, exceptional service. She was attentive and prompt to our orders, both food and drinks. The music was upbeat and a crowd pleaser for a Friday night after a long week of work.

Cubetazo of beers at a reasonable price.
Rosa excelente servicio
Cool spot too chill and get saucy food is great come here and sip a drink
Rosa is GOOD! Excellent Service! I definitely recommend this place. ü§ó

Most incredibly disgusting restaurant I‚Äôve eaten in the Area should of  ate Chipotle instead of this the food came out cold another order was over cook and one order was undercook oh and if u don‚Äôt wanna pay for hooka just have some one next to you blow it all over your food and face as we experience another thing the drinks was horrible if you wanna get robbed with out a gun come eat here
Rosa was exceptional great service awesome food and great music/atmosphere
Gabriel es el major Dios le bendiga y guarde, please contratar people like him I‚Äôm from Boston this it‚Äôs my first time her and Gabriel service was amazing, I will not doubt to come here always
Very nice, attentive and helpful
Rose was excellent everything was good
Rosa was a great serve had a great time
ROSAAAAAA AMAZING SERVICE

Lucia was a great waitress. She made my sisters birthday brunch amazing
We will be back. Thank you for everything.

This place is amazing!! Everyone should go here. Lucia was our waitress and she was nothing but amazing. She was very attentive and even provided us with shots for my mother and law birthday. I will always recommend this place to family and friends! Thank you Lucia!
Rosa is the best , ask for her when you go there üôèüèºüíØü•∞üòò
Rosa was amazing
Buen servicio de Lucia. Bien amable y rico la comida.
Our waitress Rosa very nice lady. First time here and she definitely will have me coming back. Thank you my love. You are so nice and patient. See you again. Sugar please acknowledge our lovely lady.
Rosa was a great waitress very fast and polite she's needs a Raise promote her to supervisor position she is great my wife and I enjoy her great service
Our server Gabriel was nurturing and me and my crew had a lot of fun !
Amazing atmosphere, good prices and Gabriel was amazing üî•üî•üî•
Gabriel was amazing great services.
Te queiro mucho !!!
Lucia is a awesome, very helpful server. Gave samples of drinks before ordering and shots of tequila

Excellecence service came in for just a drink ended drinkin
hing 2 bottles rosa is the best
Rosa was very nice and friendly and helpful. She enhanced the experience !!

lucia was nice. she forgot a couple of things from our order but she was very cute and accommodating. the place is super coquette and cutesy, they have a great atmosphere, great photo props and great music! would come back again just for the music and drinks :)
Lucia was great. üòä place clean and very nice. Food was amazing. Would recommend

Lucia was great. She was very attentive and offered us the best things in the menu. She constantly came to check on us and make sure we had everything we needed to have a good time. The place is beautiful, definitely recommend. Super clear, bathroom was spotless and there were multiple settings for pictures and videos. 10/10 recommend!
Rosa is excellent she‚Äôs the best everrrr üíïüíïüíï !!!
Rosa is the best waitress ever !! I love it here
Loved it here! Rosa was such an amazing waitress. She was always checking in and explaining if it took to long which most dont do. I stayed 6 hrs.. that should speak for itself
Rosa the best, . Thanks for all
Love the service ‚ù§Ô∏è
Rosa was amazing from beginning to end ! She was polite and served me well. It was my birthday and she made it extra special !!! The food was so good , I will definitely be coming back again !!
Rosa was the best
Love the fresh food. Waiter was so nice. Miss Rosa
The atmosphere was really nice! Rosa was our server and she was absolutely lovely‚Äîshe made sure we had everything we needed and checked in to ensure we were comfortable. Great experience!

Overall, Sugar is a beautiful venue that delivers on atmosphere and drinks, but has major inconsistencies with service and food quality.
‚ÄãA Vibe, Strong Drinks, and Hookah
‚ÄãThe aesthetics are a pleasure to view; the place is designed beautifully, making it a great spot for a night out. The music was good, contributing to the high-energy vibe. I also appreciate that the drinks are strong‚Äîthey definitely don't skimp on the liquor here! The hookah was nice as well and a great addition to the evening.
‚ÄãService and Food Missed the Mark
‚ÄãThe rest of the experience, unfortunately, was a letdown. Our waitress forgot about our table several times, which led to frustratingly long waits. On the food side, the chicken was dry, and the highly anticipated tres leches was a huge disappointment. It didn't taste like tres leches at all; it was more like soggy cornbread.
‚ÄãBottom line: Come here for the great atmosphere and powerful drinks, but lower your expectations for the food and be prepared for potentially slow service.

Went for Saturday brunch with my girls and had an amazing time. The mimosas and sangrias were on point! We enjoyed the calamari‚Äôs & wings as our appetizers then I had the steak & eggs; the steak was cooked to perfection and packed with flavor.

Huge shoutout to Lucia, our server, for the exceptional service! She gave us great recommendations along with customer favorites.

Will definitely be coming back and recommending this spot to family and friends!

I found this place on instagram and decided to come here last night for date night it was really good. The food the drinks the decor was really a 10 out of 10 and will be booking it for my birthday. Thanks again Lucia our server for showing amazing hospitality

The food was amazing! The staff is attentive the second you walk in the door and the service was amazing from there. The food came in good time and the drinks were to perfection. The Merlot was great and the margarita was phenomenal and strong. I will definitely be back to try the short rib sandwich. (Pictures of the aftermath)
Wendy was simply amazing! She provided excellent service and recommendations.  The food was on point and the drinks were creative and strong. Wendy is now family to us.
So I had my birthday here. We did hookah, food & drinks. Someone brought me flowers, came and spent MORE money in this establishment just for them to turn around and steal my flowers

I had the best time at Sugar! It‚Äôs definitely a vibe. Gladys is the best, she made sure that my friend and I felt welcomed and treated us with the best customer service! Definitely will recommend, sit at the bar with Gladys!

If you are bored and want to grab something to eat locally, this is a decent spot as long as you manage your expectation accordingly.

My guys took me out for dinner on a Saturday evening a couple months ago. I didn‚Äôt want to go too far so I elected for us to try Sugar. A reservation was made however, it wasn‚Äôt clear that it was needed. We were seated quickly before the hostess realized we had one and then moved us.

Here is where you must mange expectations, service was extremely slow. Even though our server was sweet, she seemed to be totally out of her element and this definitely hindered the experience. I don‚Äôt know if it was age (she appeared to be older than the others), a language barrier (English was not her first language), or unfamiliarity with the menu and/or equipment. It could have been any combination of all of the above. We literally entered our own orders into her handheld a couple of times.

The table next to us was seated after us, order and received their food & drinks (a couple of rounds) and was done and we were still waiting for our orders to be entered correctly.

I kept it simple with a Jack and Ginger ale, she wasn‚Äôt sure if they carried Jack. Thankfully they did, they seem to focus on pre-made frozen drinks and none of those appealed to me.

We order wings, and I must admit the wings were a bomb 10/10. Seasoned well, crispy, yet juicy and cooked to perfection. I did the stuffed red snapper and the guys both did chicken breast one with white rice and the other with a house salad. The guys enjoyed the chicken breast and while I enjoyed the stuff part of my snapper the fish itself was a little dry and in much need of a sauce since it also lacked flavor. I requested a chimichurri-ish sauce to help carry the dish.

As you enter the front is a little misleading as it seems to be the staff chill spot, but once you go up the stairs, the main dining area was cool with cute lighting and decent tunes playing.

Overall a decent local spot.

Just A Note:

I would return on a chill night, when again I don‚Äôt want to go too far and probably just do the wings and a drink.
Gabriel was a great server. He made sure we were okay at all times. The food was good as well, the wings (sweet chilly) was really good. They also have hookah (cash only)

3/13 Had a great time at Sugar with my family of 4. The customs service was amazing & manager was welcoming. Their pasta was AMAZING. Fish with rice and shrimp in coconut sauce was decent wish it had more coconut flavor but over all had a good time. Side note they sell hookah service so kids are exposed to smoke.

Went back 3/15
Pasta was a hit. But my partner second dish was missing favor. Bit disappointed
Lucia and Gabriel were amazing. The food was so savory and fresh. 10/10. Will return definitely

Instagram led me here to celebrate a bday. Red flag came when trying to get ahold of someome ver a week to book a birthday dinner. Sugar has the potential to be great if they are aware of their demographics and maintain inclusitivity. The manager decided to mix business with pleasure this Saturday and that was all wrong. Nepotism/ discrimination at its finest.  You dont host your personal party and infringe on paying customers, that is not fair.  The music was played like name that tune, you only heard a snippet of music if it was not Spanish. If you wanted to cater to you and your guest shut the place down for the day. The waiter was nice though he messed up awfully due to the chaos of the owners party. The food could have been better.  Came for the patron tower lmao there's only one for the entire establishment.  We waited hours for the manager to release it to no avail.  The only MVP was the bartender she's a doll.

What a vibe ! 1000/10  the food the drinks the music ! And wow Lucia was a great waitress ! She met all of our needs and made sure we had the best time . IG brought us here but Lucia will definitely bring us back ! Come for the frozen drink tower and the beef rib sandwich

Lucia was very lovely. I appreciate this restaurant. It‚Äôs very cute and chic. I came at a quieter time so i did get to take in the scenery! Very nice! My server was sweet and since it was my first time I received a ‚Äúwelcome shot‚Äù very nice.

If you‚Äôre from the southern blvd area and haven‚Äôt stopped at Sugars BBQ‚Ä¶ YOU NEED TOOO!!! The bartenders are the best! The staff is amazing, the drinks are great and the food is tasty!!! Make sure you try the Calamari always a 10 for 10.

I just find out about this place and head there for a fish w rice and shimps that it looks stunning. $43.00 but who the hell can eat a fish without salt, dry and no damn taste. The employees are beautiful. The atmosphere is awesome but I just waste my money in something not worth a dime. The rice with shimps on is it was really delicious but the coconut milk was spoiled. Unfortunately. I was planning to take my family there. Damn
I love sugar. Such a bomb restaurant. Drinks good. Food good. Good vibes. And the servers are the SWEETEST üòç especially Jassie! Shes the best!
There were so many delicious choices to choose from. Lucia was so kind and helpful when we were indecisive. The food was amazing, but the Patron tower is a must-have. Please try it when you go.
I loved the ambient. Very nice. The Bronx definitely needed a place like this. The food was GREAT! Lucia was our waiter and she was very nice and informative.

Rosa, our waiter, was so sweet and patient with me and my sis, she made she we were good and was just the cutest!! The environment was a vibe with the lighting and the music was poppin!! Def coming again <<3

Came here on a rainy night and not much people was here and still service was slow and poor. Atmosphere and vibe was good in here. Really nice inside. Our waiter, Pablo wasn‚Äôt the best though. Took him a while to come and get anything to us and kept forgetting things and didn‚Äôt quite seem like he knew what he was doing. The manager had to keep coming over to help out. You can see the other table he was waiting next to us was quite frustrated too. Food took a while for food to come out. Food looked and smelled great but all the meats were dry. Steak, ribs, chicken, brisket‚Ä¶ Flavor wasn‚Äôt there too. Also surprised that the salad doesn‚Äôt come with a dressing and they charged us for a tiny amount of dressing which we didn‚Äôt know about. Gave us wrong check also. Lot of waiting around. Restaurant also already charged us tip and then ask for more tip. Be aware of that. Was quite disappointed with this place.

The restaurant was really nice inside, the service was amazing. I had the mac and cheese which was very tasty and not dry. The wings had a good flavor but were a bit over-fried not my fav. My friend had the shrimp mofongo and it was the best dish out of all. The lychee was strong but taste was not consistent. Don‚Äôt let the location scare you off. The vibes are great here. We went on a Friday night and they had live music. Will definitely return

Today I went to sugar with my family and friends and I was serve by this amazing and charming guy named Gabriel. The food was extraordinary and delicious, the drinks were phenomenal and the services was spectacular. I definitely recommend any this place. I also talked to the owner and he is a delightful and friendly person.
Rosa was a great server, very attentive and serviceable. Place and atmosphere was beyond my expectations

I just wanted to say Jassie is my girl ! always been so sweet attentive and caring !! I love going to Sugar BBQ whether its for happy hour or just a normal day. Great drinks great food great music beautiful atmosphere! What more can a girl ask for? It‚Äôs about time we got a spot out here for us. But no matter what for sure u know if Jassie behind the bar you gonna be taken care of for a fact ! Come see for yourself ü´∂üèæ‚ù§Ô∏èü•∞

I came here to celebrate my homegirl‚Äôs bday and enjoy happy hour which is from 12PM-7 PM by the way (amazing!). I had the shrimp and chicken alfredo, which was flavorful but i didn‚Äôt like the shrimp too much but that didn‚Äôt downplay the meal. The drinks were also good too! Jassie was exceptional and ensured we were good and that our cups were never empty! I would definitely come back again and tell my friends! =]
The food here was so good! Lucia was our waiter, the most attentive and beautiful soul. Will definitely come back again!

If I could give this place 10 stars, I would. Our first time here was so wonderful, from the ambiance to the service to the food. The whole place has a vibe that was so desperately needed in this area of the Bronx. Our server Jackie was absolutely wonderful, caring without being overbearing, offering us samples of different things to try, was communicative and engaging, and totally sweet. The food was amazing, from the meatball and calamari starters to the pasta mains. Everything was so fresh and well prepared. Then desert which I'm usually not a huge fan of (I decided to just go for it) a Caramel flan with some coconut...stunning. After dinner, the manager Christian came over and spoke with us a bit. We never felt rushed or pressured. He even gave us two shots on the house.  This is a wonderful place, we give and wish for nothing but blessings for the establishment and its staff and will most definitely be back. ~ with utmost respect ~Jan and Jay.

Omg really enjoyed myself.The atmosphere was amazing and inviting.The service was so good.Let‚Äôs get into the food the calamari was a little over done but still good the mufungo stuffed with shrimp was delicious that snapper in coconut sauce was really tasty.I enjoyed everything I would definitely recommend and return the next time I‚Äôm in The Bronx

This is my first time visiting this place.  The vibe is awesome, and the service is friendly and spectacular .  I want to thank all the service staff for the detail and attention given to your customers.  The food is very delicious and flavorful.  Jackie was our server tonight.  Jackie was professional,  friendly, attentive, flexible, and accommodating.  My partner and I ordered two different pasta dishes that were absolutely delicious.   The only thing missing was buttery garlic bread to compliment the pasta dish.  Let's not Christian, the manager.  Wow.  It was unexpected for the manager to come to our table to greet us, to say hello and inquire about our feedback.  He is so pleasant, amicable, charismatic, and has a very lovely charm.  SUGAR Smoked BBQ......... welcome to our community!!!!!!!!  May God bless this amazing establishment in our Bronx neighborhood/community to prosper and blossom.   May this establishment  be blessed with the highest success for many, many years to come. Continue to be great and offer excellent food and service to the community.   We will be back again, again and again.

Food was excellent. The portions generous. The staff is courteous and attentive. There was music playing but not too loud. Lighting is good. I would  have give five stars, but for one thing. The gratuity is included. That is fine. Too many people don't tip. However. Once you pay, they give you a blank to sign with a space and suggestions for an additional tip. They didn't return the original bill which showed the gratuity included. I didn't like that.
Super cute brunch place! The mimosas and sangria were delicious. The calamari was my fave and Lucia was an amazing server. Can‚Äôt wait to come back for happy hour!
I frequent sugar and every time I come the hospitality, service and vibe is a good time!!!!!! The drinks are on point thank you again Gladys you rock girl. Always showing a good time
I had such a great time here. Lucia was my server and she was hands down the best! She was attentive and got everything we needed.  Honestly so great because of her. If you come ask for her

Jassie was super super pleasant. She made the experience even more good. I dont know the gentleman name that brought out our food he was caring cause the wrong food was given I was like it's ok he said no how can I make you happy that's what I do. ü´∂üèΩ
Lucia was an amazing server . She was attentive and helpful. The food was delicious.

First of all food was AMAZING,  my server Pablo was super attentive and sweet, he was great. The absolute only thing I disliked was the cornbread it was hard and super dry but everything else was spot on. I will def be back!

I live close by and always pass through there, today we decided to try it out. Drinks 10/10 food 10/10 I couldn‚Äôt breathe I was sooo full.!
Our waitress was amazing turns out her name is Rosa! I‚Äôve read reviews on her and they do not disappoint! This our new family dinner place to go to ! I will definitely be coming here with  my girls to check out the night life !

My table was served by Pablo, and he gave us great service. The food was served quickly and was absolutely delicious. The pina coladas are delicious as well, and I am definitely looking forward to trying other drinks on the menu. I was able to get a picture of my T-bone steak and my friends NY strip. Both tasted amazing. I‚Äôm definitely coming back and would 100% recommend for you to try.
